scenes.description: Mori Calliope continues her performance of the song 'GOGETTERS'.
Performance of the song 'Overkill' in a surreal, grey architectural setting.
MC section where Mori Calliope addresses the audience, introducing her new album and upcoming songs.

subtitles.original: 皆さん!

subtitles.original: Welcome, welcome to a very special showing
subtitles.english: Welcome, welcome to a very special showing

subtitles.original: of several songs from my brand new album, PHANTOMIME.
subtitles.english: of several songs from my brand new album, PHANTOMIME.

subtitles.original: As you can see, the stage that I'm performing on today
subtitles.english: As you can see, the stage that I'm performing on today

subtitles.original: is a bit different than the usual that you might be used to.
subtitles.english: is a bit different than the usual that you might be used to.

subtitles.original: But we wanted to make this kind of like...
subtitles.english: But we wanted to make this kind of like...

subtitles.original: ...I don't know, a more intimate feeling setting, I guess.
subtitles.english: ...I don't know, a more intimate feeling setting, I guess.

subtitles.original: And I know that you guys at home are watching,
subtitles.english: And I know that you guys at home are watching,

subtitles.original: so I'm just kind of imagining the audience all around me.
subtitles.english: so I'm just kind of imagining the audience all around me.

subtitles.original: But yeah, it kind of feels like a TV live to be honest.
subtitles.english: But yeah, it kind of feels like a TV live to be honest.

subtitles.original: It's really cool. I love all of the different settings
subtitles.english: It's really cool. I love all of the different settings

subtitles.original: that they have come up with here.
subtitles.english: that they have come up with here.

subtitles.original: Just now I performed two songs
subtitles.english: Just now I performed two songs

subtitles.original: that I've already done before off of the album.
subtitles.english: that I've already done before off of the album.

subtitles.original: Two songs that you guys are very familiar with, of course.
subtitles.english: Two songs that you guys are very familiar with, of course.

subtitles.original: GOGETTERS from Suicide Squad Isekai ending,
subtitles.english: GOGETTERS from Suicide Squad Isekai ending,

subtitles.original: and then also Overkill, which is one of my craziest songs yet,
subtitles.english: and then also Overkill, which is one of my craziest songs yet,

subtitles.original: that I have released the music video for on my channel.
subtitles.english: that I have released the music video for on my channel.

subtitles.original: Probably one of my favorite songs that I've ever made,
subtitles.english: Probably one of my favorite songs that I've ever made,

subtitles.original: and definitely a good follow-up to JIGOKU 6.
subtitles.english: and definitely a good follow-up to JIGOKU 6.

subtitles.original: But from here on out, I think that I'd like to do
subtitles.english: But from here on out, I think that I'd like to do

subtitles.original: some songs that you guys haven't heard yet.
subtitles.english: some songs that you guys haven't heard yet.

subtitles.original: In fact, I think I'd like to perform two of them,
subtitles.english: In fact, I think I'd like to perform two of them,

subtitles.original: and maybe, maybe another one after that
subtitles.english: and maybe, maybe another one after that

subtitles.original: if you guys are really feeling it, I don't know.
subtitles.english: if you guys are really feeling it, I don't know.

subtitles.original: But the next song that I would like to introduce
subtitles.english: But the next song that I would like to introduce

subtitles.original: is a song called "Cult Following".
subtitles.english: is a song called "Cult Following".

subtitles.original: It's my collaboration song with Worgasm.
subtitles.english: It's my collaboration song with Worgasm.

subtitles.original: And then after that, after that song,
subtitles.english: And then after that, after that song,

subtitles.original: I will perform a song that you guys have been waiting for
subtitles.english: I will perform a song that you guys have been waiting for

subtitles.original: for a long time, and I know you guys are really excited.
